Orders can be placed online or over the phone. Our friendly staff will be on hand to take your order and confirm details of your delivery and can be paid for easily over the phone using a credit or debit card.\n\n‚Äã\n\nOur products are carefully sourced from UK sources where possible and trusted EU suppliers.\n\n‚Äã\n\nTo make your life easier we have put together some simple weekly meat packs at competitive pricing.",

We have 35 acres of fields and orchards to walk around, providing you with a wide variety of seasonal produce.",

We have also made some great changes which include, ‚Äúready to eat‚Äù and ‚ÄúReady to cook‚Äù products on the counter.\n\nWe have also made a conscious decision as a company in minimise plastic packaging. We want to encourage our customers to bring their own bags or Tupperware boxes and be rewarded with a loyalty card which we get stamped each time bring in your own packaging. Paper bags and ‚Äúbags for life‚Äù will be available to purchase over the counter at a small cost.\n\nThe shop by Hove Lagoon offers the widest selection of local fish and shellfish caught by our fleet of boats. We also stock seafood from further afield in order to offer our customers the best possible choice of seafood.\n\nFrom fresh fish to live shellfish, frozen and complimentary products, our skilled and knowledgeable team can assist you with the purchase and preparation of your seafood requirements.",

    "notes": "Set in the heart of Brighton‚Äôs North Laine, Infinity Foods Shop has one of the largest selection of organic and natural vegetarian and vegan foods in the South East. We also cater for a range of dietary needs, including gluten-free and raw food.",

    "notes": "Born from the inspirational pub and beer scene of Brighton, Laine Brew Co brews beer imbued with a love of flavour, experimentation and good times. Our beers are unfiltered, unpasteurised and uncompromising ‚Äì meaning more flavour and more love. \n\nOur beers are sold across our home town of Brighton and in a wide selection of nationwide outlets.",
